channel.title: Course Notes on c6p - log
channel.description: Recent content in Course Notes on c6p - log

item.description: My CS-537: Introduction to Operating Systems course notes from OSSU curriculum. Math functionality test: $\sigma^2$ $$\frac{2}{\epsilon}$$ History # Just Libraries # OS would provide API. Jobs set up and then run in a batch by the operator. Computers were not interactive. Protection # The idea of system call invented by Atlas computing system. Instead of providing OS routines as a library (procedure call), special instructions to transition into a more formal, controlled process.
